channel.title: About on Data Science Group, AIMS, SA.
channel.description: Recent content in About on Data Science Group, AIMS, SA.

item.title: Objectives
item.description: The key object is to empower female students at AIMS South Africa to achieve their full potential. Furthermore, AIMSWIS intends to train a generation of women scientists as mentors to increase the number of role models for girls in African communities. Finally, AIMSWIS wishes to create a space for women students in mathematical sciences.

item.title: Program
item.description: AIMSWIS provides a huge diversity of events and offers from which the students can benefit. Next to the In-House Women’s Mentorship program which includes panel discussions, public lectures and skill workshops among others, emphasis is also put on outreach.
